title: Beautiful Home in Prime Location Near Cal State Long Beach!
posting_body: Beautiful Home in Prime Location Near Cal State Long Beach!
This wonderful Long Beach home has loads of upgrades including beautiful laminate hardwood floors, and a fresh and modern paint scheme throughout.
The large living room features a huge bay window and a formal dining room.
The upgraded kitchen is complete with rich wood cabinets, composite countertops with tile backsplash, upgraded stone flooring, stove, dishwasher, microwave, and laundry hook-ups in the pantry area.
Also featured are a large 2-car detached garage, large rear yard, and covered patio.
Located near Conant St. and Palo Verde Ave.
For more information on this or any other available property, please contact Ernst & Haas Management at
, or visit us online at <URL> and apply today.
• Credit score must be no less than 600
• Monthly gross income to qualify must be 2 ½ times the rent
• We do not accept past evictions, judgments, or collections from a management company or landlord
Proof of coverage must be provided upon the signing of your lease.
*Note - See selection criteria for a detailed list of qualifications on our website at <URL>
PLEASE BE AWARE OF RENTAL SCAMS:
We caution all applicants to be diligent in researching the legitimacy of any potential rental listing.
All deposits, rents, and rental agreements are ONLY executed at Ernst & Haas Management, 4120 Atlantic Ave., Long Beach, CA.

If you are being asked to fill out a third-party application or are being asked to pay cash or send money via an App, Western Union, Money-Gram, or Prepaid Visa card, STOP these are signs of rental listing scams used to defraud applicants.
*ALL INFORMATION DEEMED ACCURATE BUT NOT GUARANTEED.
APPLIANCES ARE PROVIDED AS A COURTESY AND ARE NOT MANDATORY TO THE LEASE.
TERMS ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE WITHOUT NOTICE.
